body:
XSDK is a metapackage over: many packages.

Most package updates have gone through individual PRs

This PR also includes updates to:
- alquimia (xsdk release)
- pflotran  (xsdk release)
- plasma (ideally a separate PR - but then would have to wait for it to get to master before doing xsdk PR - so its included here)
title: Xsdk 0.3.0
